sqlQuery.name: bulkAnswerFilterCounts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH geneList -- list of (distinct) genes in the current ID query AS (SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS counter, gene_source_id AS source_id FROM ##WDK_ID_SQL##) SELECT filter_name, max(count) AS count FROM ( -- count genes in geneList by organism SELECT organism AS filter_name, sum(counter) AS count FROM apidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, geneList WHERE ga.source_id = geneList.source_id GROUP BY organism UNION -- count genes in geneList by species SELECT species AS filter_name, sum(counter) AS count FROM apidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, geneList WHERE ga.source_id = geneList.source_id GROUP BY species UNION -- zero-count rows for above filters SELECT filter_name, 0 as count FROM apidbTuning.GeneSummaryFilter UNION -- overall gene count (simply the cardinality of geneList) SELECT 'all_results' AS filter_name, count(*) AS count FROM geneList ) GROUP BY filter_name

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenes
sqlQuery.sql: select count (distinct gene_source_id) as count from ($$WDK_ID_SQL$$)

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenesWithMissingTranscripts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH WDK_ID_SQL as $$WDK_ID_SQL$$ -- wonder if we dont want to use the prefiltered result select count (distinct m.gene_source_id) as propertyValue from ( select ta.gene_source_id, ta.source_id from apidbtuning.transcriptattributes ta, (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_1 where idsql_1.gene_source_id = ta.gene_source_id MINUS select gene_source_id, source_id from (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_2 --where idsql_2.matched_result = 'Y' --cannot be used in boolean steps, plus might not be needed ) m

sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, gene_source_id, project_id, wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$

sqlQuery.name: AllOrthologGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS source_id, MAX(ta.gene_source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS gene_source_id, ta.project_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id GROUP BY ta.orthomcl_name, ta.project_id

sqlQuery.name: OrganismGeneInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ta.source_id, ta.gene_source_id, ta.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.organism like $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: DistinctGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ t.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) AS source_id, ta.project_id, ta.gene_id as gene_source_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.species = $$species$$ GROUP BY ta.gene_id,ta.project_id ) t

sqlQuery.name: DeprecatedGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta where ta.source_id = c.source_id and ta.organism = 'Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB' and ta.is_deprecated = $$deprecated_genes$$

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c WHERE c.project_id = $$Project$$
